#3. Fibonacci
```{r}
num <- readline(prompt = "Enter a number from 1 to 500: ")
num <- as.integer(num)
  
    for (i in 1:num) 
       if (i < 1 || i > 500) {
    print("Invalid input!")
    break
 }
 fibonacci <- (((1 + sqrt(5)) / 2) ^ i) - (((1 - sqrt(5)) / 2) ^ i)
 print(paste("Fibonacci(", i, ") = ", round(fibonacci, 0)))
} 
}

```
